alert.note: Alert for Alaska Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 13 at 12:56PM AKDT until March 15 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TUESDAY TO 4 PM AKDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. North winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Reduced visibilities to one half mile. * WHERE...Alaska Peninsula. * WHEN...From 4 AM Tuesday to 4 PM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel may be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty northerly winds will develop tonight along with widespread snow showers, contributing to periods of low visibility. Gusty winds will persist through at least late Wednesday night, though snow shower coverage may gradually decrease beyond Wednesday. This will lead to an extended threat of blowing snow through midweek.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
